"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52e183a163687259d6e10000#post_52e183a163687259d6e10000

Have you ever walked outside ever to feel 30 MPH winds scrape at your cleavage, unable to pull up your shirt _because that's how the thing is built?_

Oh, wait.


"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52e183f76368727c179d0000#post_52e183f76368727c179d0000

I mean, it's not always a bad thing. Sometimes it's a nice look.

Not when Autumn is turning into Winter, though. Then it's not.

topics.body:
I discovered a new hobby:
If two socially awkward people you know like each other, but don't have enough courage to ask each other out, playfully tease them.  I don't mean as like bully, but I mean speak in sexual undertones getting them both hot and bothered then say to them, "Hey what if I ask them about how they feel about you?" then get the other person hot and bothered as well so when they do confess to each other they're both extremely hot under the collar needing a cold shower.
